ygData.subject: Re: Cleric armour quest (spoilers wanted)
ygData.msgSnippet: jovan is in highkeep....he was bugged when i found him....would appear in the cy and then walk up the stairs and vanish.....have to hail him when he 1st
ygData.messageBody:
jovan is in highkeep....he was bugged when i found him....would appear in the
cy and then walk up the stairs and vanish.....have to hail him when he 1st
appears....i haven't been to lake rathe yet....been working on the icons over
on faydwer...just need the one off bilge if i can ever find him.....

Woland Grauensturm wrote:

> From: Woland Grauensturm <woland@...>
>
> I have been looking for Jovan the Fervent in Highpass hold. No luck yet.
> Has anyone seen him?
>
> I have also been searching in Kithicor for the burned down hut. I found two
> of them so far, but no icon/ingots. Near one hut were four shadowed men. I
> and another cleric died trying to kill them, thinking that maybe one of
> them has a part.
>
> Also, has anyone found the icon in Lake Rathe that belongs to the Reliant?
>
> // JS
>
>
